columns.name: employee_name
columns.description: Employee's name

columns.description: Employee ID

columns.description: ActiveDirectory username

columns.name: gender
columns.description: Employee's recorded gender

columns.name: age
columns.description: Age of the employee in years

columns.name: ethnicity_hispanic
columns.description: Whether the employee identifies as of Hispanic ethnicity

columns.name: race_asian
columns.description: Whether the employee identifies as Asian

columns.name: race_black
columns.description: Whether the employee identifies as Black or African-American

columns.name: race_native
columns.description: Whether the employee identifies as American Indian or Alaska Native

columns.name: race_pacific
columns.description: Whether the employee identifies as Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander

columns.name: race_white
columns.description: Whether the employee identifies as White

columns.name: active
columns.description: Whether employee is active

columns.name: employee_email
columns.description: Employee's City email address

columns.name: employment_status
columns.description: Employment status, e.g., full-time, part-time benefited, part-time non-benefited, etc.)

columns.name: position
columns.description: Employee's position title

columns.name: annual_base_salary
columns.description: Employee's annual base salary

columns.name: department_id
columns.description: ID of the City department where the employee works

columns.name: department
columns.description: City department where the employee works

columns.name: division_id
columns.description: ID of the City division where the employee works

columns.name: division
columns.description: City division where the employee works

columns.name: supervisor_id
columns.description: Employee ID of the employee's supervisor

columns.name: supervisor
columns.description: Name of the employee's supervisor

columns.name: supervisor_email
columns.description: Email address of the employee's supervisor

columns.name: original_hire_date
columns.description: Earliest date of hire of the employee

columns.name: latest_hire_date
columns.description: Latest date of hire of the employee

columns.name: ad_memberships
columns.description: Comma-separated list of ActiveDirectory groups of which the employee is a member
